title: Synthesis of N-doped porous carbon derived from biomass waste for activating peroxymonosulfate in water decontamination: mechanism insight and biotoxicity assessment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3790-3801
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00481G, Paper
Shun Ding, Fangyu Fu, Huibin Niu, Jiaying Yan, Yanfen Fang, Xiang Liu
Herein, a series of N-doped carbon nanomaterials were synthesized by the pyrolysis of biomass waste and various nitrogen sources for sulfamethoxazole degradation via peroxymonosulfate activation.
